info.name: Tessano
info.color: Deep and intense, bright ruby red with hints of burgundy.
info.perfume: Full and enveloping. Refined, elegant and delicate. Complex and with a rich variety of nuances that range from vanilla to toasted almonds, coffee, liquorice and cinnamon.
info.flavor: Dry, full, delicate and harmonious. This is a prestigious wine with just the right balance of quality tannins and measured acidity. Warm and austere with an excellent structure and considerable depth. Persistent taste-olfactory sensations.
info.gastronomic_combinations: Rich red meat dishes, game and mature cheeses.

info.name: Brugneto
info.color: Intense ruby red with violet overtones when young, verging on garnet red with ageing.
info.perfume: Refined, full and variegated, with traces of blackberry and bilberry
info.flavor: Dry with a full-bodied structure, but also harmonious, soft and elegant.
info.gastronomic_combinations: Strongly flavoured dishes of red meats, game and matured cheeses.

info.name: Sangiovese
info.color: Intense ruby red with violet overtones when young, verging on garnet red with ageing.
info.perfume: Refined, intense, fruity, with traces of fresh fruit with an aroma of grape blossom.
info.flavor: Full-bodied structure, harmonious and soft with a persistent taste.
info.gastronomic_combinations: Very easy to combine with almost all dishes, but it can be drunk alone for a relaxing moment.

info.name: Rosso Dei Castelli
info.perfume: Refined, fruity, pleasant vinosity, with aromas of cherry and strawberry.
info.flavor: Dry, sharply full-bodied but harmonious and balanced.
info.gastronomic_combinations: Various traditional San Marinese dishes, pasta with meat sauces, braised or grilled chicken and veal.

info.name: Roncale
info.flavor: Dry, fruity and with body, harmonious and persistent with a slightly bitter aftertaste.
info.gastronomic_combinations: Hors d'oeuvres, cold summer dishes (pasta dishes with tomato and basil, cold veal with tuna sauce, chicken galantine etc.), fish-based dishes and in particular, grilled fish.

info.name: Caldese
info.color: Pale yellow with darker yellow tinges.
info.perfume: Refined full and variegated with notes of esotic fruit.
info.flavor: Dry, fruity and with body, harmonious and very persistent.
info.gastronomic_combinations: Hors d'oeuvres, fish-based dishes and in particular, grilled fish and spicy white meat.

info.name: Biancale
info.color: Pale yellow with brilliant greenish overtones.
info.perfume: Refined, intense, fruity and flowery, with an aroma of grape blossom;
info.flavor: Dry but soft and well-balanced. Fresh and lively flavour with a pleasantly bitter aftertaste.
info.gastronomic_combinations: Excellent as an aperitif, with fish dishes, particularly fried fish and fish kebabs, with salami hors d'oeuvres and with rice and pasta dishes with delicately flavoured sauces.

info.name: Bianco Del Castelli
info.perfume: Refined, delicately fruity, fresh and persistent.
info.gastronomic_combinations: Excellent refreshment wine between meals or for serving with light hors d'oeuvres and other simple dishes, fish in particular.

info.name: Moscato Spumante
info.perfume: Delicately fruity with typical grape aroma and traces of sage and ripe pear.
info.flavor: Sweet and harmonious, fresh and aromatic.
info.gastronomic_combinations: Suitable for a wide variety of desserts.

info.name: Moscato
info.perfume: Fine, aromatic, persistent, fruity and typical of Muscat grapes.
info.serving_instructions: Uncork the bottle at the moment.

info.name: Grilet
info.perfume: Refined and fruity with a slight smell of crusty bread.
info.gastronomic_combinations: Excellent as an aperitif, with salami, herb or asparagus omelettes, fried fish and pasta dishes with tomato sauce. Ideal with the oven-baked pizzas.
